name: Solarpunk Invaders
description:
controls:

A/D :- switch batteries to charge 

Arrow left/Arrow Right:- switch defense to activate

Space bar:- Shoot/Burn

Game Description:

Switch between batteries using keys A and D, Green indicator indicates the battery being charged.

Switch between the defence systems using the left and the right arrow keys.

the indicator on top indicates the defence system is activated.

Press space to use (turret/burner) defence system. using the defence system consumes a charge.  Each battery is connected to one defence system.

Recharge batteries to be able to use particular defence systems.
